Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the story of the photo by stating that the mother deer sacrificed herself to save her babies, when in fact the photographer clarified that this was not the case.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a false narrative that has been debunked by the photographer who took the photo.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo shows a mother deer sacrificing herself, which is not supported by the actual story behind the photo.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, which is that the mother deer was not sacrificing herself but was simply being chased by cheetahs, as clarified by the photographer.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the mother deer did not sacrifice herself, as confirmed by the photographer.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting a false narrative that has been debunked by the photographer.
Understate: There is no evidence of any bias of understating in the claim.
